mapper.insert: insert into user_tb ( username, email, display_nickname, user_profile_img_url, last_login_dt, created_dt, updated_dt ) values ( #{username}, #{email}, #{displayNickname}, #{userProfileImgUrl}, NOW(), NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: select user_id as userId, username, email, user_birth as userBirth, phone, display_nickname as displayNickname, user_profile_img_url as userProfileImgUrl, last_login_dt as lastLoginDt, created_dt as createdDt, updated_dt as updatedDt from user_tb where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: update user_tb set display_nickname = #{displayNickname}, user_birth = #{userBirth}, phone = #{phone}, user_profile_img_url = #{userProfileImgUrl}, updated_dt = NOW() where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update user_tb set last_login_dt = NOW(), updated_dt = NOW() where user_id = #{userId}
